sect2.title: Introduction to OpenOffice
sect2.para: The OpenOffice is a office suite, the Open Source sibling of StarOffice.

sect2.title: Additional downloads
sect2.para: Download the General Polygon Clipper Library from .

Also download the various patches from . The openoffice-&openoffice-version;-no-pam.patch is needed only if Linux PAM is not installed. The openoffice-&openoffice-version;-no-mozab.patch disables building of Mozilla Addressbook which causes build problems since OpenOffice includes precompiled Mozilla libraries that are incompatible with LFS. The openoffice-&openoffice-version;-test-bin-loc.patch corrects the location where the installation scripts look for the test executable.
The source tarball only contains English language help. A localized help content file may be available at .
